name: Jeben Dystonia
description:
This is a game that was made for the Portland Summer Slow Jam. https://itch.io/jam/ssjhorror

You've woken up in an unfamiliar room. Your head hurts and the room door is locked. Last you remember, you were gearing up to contain something. Get outside before one of the things roaming around does it first. 

WASD or Arrow Keys to move. E to interact, Space to jump, C to crouch, and Shift to sprint.

Credits:

Amanda Rivera (Air.Artist): 3D Modeling and Art

Benjamin Morales: Programming

Eoin Olswold: Music

Franz Chavez: Programming and Design

Isaac B. : Art, Level and Menu Design

Jef Drawbaugh: SFX

Soren Mathison: Character Design

Victor Miyai: Audio Implementation
